coreAttributes.name: sai
coreAttributes.description: A small single-handed sai, designed specifically for use in combat. A stabbing weapon used primarily for stabbing and striking, it's lightweight and thus allowing the wielder to efficiently thrust its tip into their target.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] hold of [npc.her] sai as [npc.she] [npc.verb(get)] ready to use it in combat.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Thrusting [npc.her] sai, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to strike [npc2.name] right in the chest; the ethereal arcane blade passing through [npc2.her] torso to drain [npc2.her] energy!
Thrusting out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] sai, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to stab through [npc2.her] [npc2.arm] with the ethereal blade and drain [npc2.her] energy!
With a quick [npc.step] forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(lunge)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] sai, sinking the ethereal blade into [npc2.her] shoulder and causing [npc2.herHim] to lose some energy!
hitDescriptions.criticalHitText: Expertly sidestepping around [npc2.namePos] attempt to block [npc.her] attack, [npc.name] [npc.verb(deal)] a devastating thrust with [npc.her] sai!

missDescriptions.missText: Thrusting [npc.her] sai, [npc.name] [npc.verb(attempt)] to stab [npc2.name] in the chest, but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
Thrusting out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] sai, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick [npc.step] forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(lunge)] out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] sai, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
